üí° Pro Tips for Booking Hotels in Goa

schedule Best Booking Time

Book 2-3 months in advance for peak season (Nov-Feb). Last-minute deals available during monsoon (Jun-Sep) with up to 50% off.

map Location Matters

North Goa (Calangute, Baga, Candolim) for nightlife and water sports. South Goa (Palolem, Agonda) for peaceful beaches and relaxation.

restaurant Meal Plans

Consider breakfast-only plans as Goa has amazing beach shacks and restaurants. All-inclusive rarely worth it in Goa.

directions_car Transportation

Most hotels offer airport transfers (‚Çπ1,000-2,000). Rent a scooter (‚Çπ300-500/day) or bike for exploring beaches independently.

local_offer Price Comparison

Always compare prices across Booking.com, Agoda, and MakeMyTrip. Prices can vary by ‚Çπ500-2,000 for the same room.

star Check Reviews

Look for recent reviews (last 6 months) focusing on cleanliness, location, and staff service. 4.2+ rating is generally good.
